AMBARI_SERVER.name: ambari_server_agent_heartbeat
AMBARI_SERVER.label: Ambari Agent Heartbeat
AMBARI_SERVER.description: This alert is triggered if the server has lost contact with an agent.

AMBARI_SERVER.name: ambari_server_stale_alerts
AMBARI_SERVER.label: Ambari Server Alerts
AMBARI_SERVER.description: This alert is triggered if the server detects that there are alerts which have not run in a timely manner.

AMBARI_AGENT.name: ambari_agent_disk_usage
AMBARI_AGENT.label: Host Disk Usage
AMBARI_AGENT.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the amount of disk space used goes above specific thresholds. The default threshold values are 50% for WARNING and 80% for CRITICAL

parameters.name: minimum.free.space
parameters.description: The overall amount of free disk space left before an alert is triggered.

parameters.name: percent.used.space.warning.threshold
parameters.description: The percent of disk space consumed before a warning is triggered.

parameters.name: percent.free.space.critical.threshold
parameters.description: The percent of disk space consumed before a critical alert is triggered.
